root.name: Motion Profiler
root.description: Track manager plug-in measuring motion statistics in 2D/3D, including min/max/avg/total displacement (absolute & relative to origin), and displacement profiles along all spatial axes.
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 3.0.3.0 Date 2014-08-21 17:02:11
* Renamed "Relative" to "net" displacement * New "tortuosity" measure (ratio of net to total displacement"
- Version 3.0.2.0 Date 2014-07-21 18:43:42
Improved track filtering performance
- Version 3.0.1.0 Date 2014-07-21 15:23:50
- Moved the "export" button on the upper interface panel - Fixed the "Filter tracks" option which wasn't working - The statistics table now includes the name of each group and the track's ID within the group
- Version 3.0.0.1 Date 2014-06-20 16:41:22
Re-uploaded JAR file (rolled back class path to initial one)
- Version 3.0.0.0 Date 2014-06-20 16:24:45
New feature: tracks can now be filtered based on the available motion statistics
- Version 2.0.0.4 Date 2014-06-19 17:00:55
Fixing the JAR file (again)
- Version 2.0.0.3 Date 2014-06-19 16:54:58
Regression from version 2.0.0.1
- Version 2.0.0.2 Date 2014-06-19 16:53:50
Re-uploading the correct JAR file
- Version 2.0.0.1 Date 2014-06-19 16:51:31
Regression from version 1.0.1.0
- Version 2.0.0.0 Date 2014-06-19 16:49:56
Rewrote plug-in from scratch. New interface, faster calculations, new display for plots & graphs, and export functionalities
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2013-07-02 16:09:58
Fixed display issue in the track manager
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2012-08-08 16:13:07
- Fixed error when setting the display sequence to null - Graphical layout adjusted
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-08-08 15:44:29
